name: Brunel
description: Brunel International N.V. is a global service provider specializing in the flexible deployment of professionals across various sectors. Established in 1975, Brunel has grown into an international group with over 12,000 employees worldwide1. They offer services in fields like Engineering, Aerospace, Automotive, ICT, Finance, Legal, Insurance & Banking, and Oil & Gas23.
features: Provide work force in Renewable energy sector
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Connecting Specialists to Pioneering Projects
ShortDescription: A powerful global network, connecting the most talented and experienced specialists with both present-day and pioneering projects
enhanced_description: Brunel International N.V. is a global service provider established in 1975, specializing in the flexible deployment of professionals. With over 12,000 employees worldwide, Brunel operates as a powerful global network, connecting talented and experienced specialists with both present-day and pioneering projects. They offer services across various sectors including Engineering, Aerospace, Automotive, ICT, Finance, Legal, Insurance & Banking, Oil & Gas, and notably, the Renewable energy sector. Brunel's services aim to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency for their clients by providing expert workforce solutions.
key_use_cases: Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency through professional expertise
Providing workforce solutions in specific sectors like Renewable energy
competitive_advantages: Global service capability with a worldwide facility
Large global network of over 12,000 employees
Specialization in diverse and critical sectors
Focus on connecting talented and experienced specialists
roi_benefits: Accelerated skill development and learning efficiency
Access to specialized and experienced professionals for projects
primary_users: HR departments focused on skill development and learning initiatives
